#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

Try [08InstallationUbuntu Installing 0.8-beta] (see [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/wiki/ReleaseNotes release notes]).

The !BigBlueButton 0.71a server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit or 64-bit, as well as distributions listed below.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:

    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine (0.71a)] 
    * [InstallationUbuntu Install from packages on Ubuntu 10.04 (0.71a)]
    * [InstallingBigBlueButton Install from source on Ubuntu (0.71a)]

Other install options:
    * [InstallationBigBlueButtonDebian Debian Squeeze] (v0.71a)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonFreeBSD FreeBSD/PC-BSD] (v0.70)

Configuration files:
    * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]
    * [BBBConf bbb-conf] configuration tool
